channel.description:
Best Most Intense Rare Raw Real War Combat Footage Archive

-SUBSCRIBE- for this War/Combat Footage Archive with footage from all around the world. This Channel is scrict non political and is not meant to glorify war or violence in any case! This channel is an War Archive and should be seen as as educational. My aim is to share these videos for the sole purposes of news reporting, educating and the transformative nature of the footage. This Channel is also to be taken as a documentary on the events of recent conflicts from all around the world and should be seen as a memento for all the brave men who fought for their contrys and lost their lives in tragic battles all over the world. May one day this will not happen again and there will be peace for everyone. If you want to send me some of your footage feel free to message me via YouTube thanks.

This channel is in no way affiliated with any Government, DND or DoD.

-aDRI
channel.title: adri12345
channel.keywords: "raw combat footage" best most intense insane rare real war firefight fighting battlefield battle clash shootout footage syria afghanistan iraq bosnia wars from all over the world news history soldier military special forces army navy marines air force videos "youtube official channel"
